section.heading: Liability for inaccurate information in filed record.
section.text: If a record delivered to the Mayor for filing under this chapter and filed by the Mayor contains inaccurate information, a person that suffers a loss by reliance on the information may recover damages for the loss from a person that signed the record or caused another to sign it on the person’s behalf and knew at the time the record was signed that the information was inaccurate.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 205 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
